root: ^I am so sorry, Spud! I hoped it would not have come to this, but I had no choice. My king threatened me with your safety, my hands were tied!
^If I had known he was your father, I never would have come here! I just wanted to protect you, to keep you safe! You are like a son to me. Remember all these years we spent together?
^... come on, Spud. Let's go home.
^NO! You killed my father! Do you seriously think I can forgive you?!
^I am going to kill you! FOR PAPA!!!

archie_attack: ^Spud is charging at you! You could end him right there. Or you could run away and spare his life...

c-0: ^With a heavy heart, you leave Spud behind and run for your life...
c-1: ^I never thought it would come to this, Spud... but here we are.
